citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
Female Shih-tzu (DOB 5-29-18, tag #14)'s teeth are mostly covered with plaque and tartar. Her lower left front tooth
(incisor) by the large canine was loose to the touch and the gums on various teeth were receded. These are signs of
dental disease and if left untreated can cause health problems and discomfort for the dog. Ensure that this dog is seen by
the attending veterinarian (AV) and treated per the AV's instructions.
***Correct by February 8, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
Female Shih-tzu (DOB 5-29-18, tag #14)'s teeth are mostly covered with plaque and tartar. Her lower left front tooth 
(incisor) by the large canine was loose to the touch and the gums on various teeth were receded. These are signs of 
dental disease and if left untreated can cause health problems and discomfort for the dog. Ensure that this dog is seen by

***Correct by February 8, 2024.
